formatted_address: 11 Tanjong Katong Rd, #03-05 Kinex Shopping Mall, Singapore 437157
name: Sing My Song Family Karaoke Kinex

reviews.text:
My friends and I love this no-frills place for K, and there's also a $40 deal (on weekdays only IIRC) where you can sing from 2 to 6 pm. We booked a small room with 2 microphones. The mics are also super loud though you can adjust the reverb. We didn't bother with the fancy lighting and we just got right down to singing!

Do take note that when your time is up, the song will be cut off halfway and you won't get to sing the entirety of it!

This was my first visit with friends to experience the highly recommended karaoke sound system, and it did not disappoint me. I was truly impressed by the exceptional sound quality and the outstanding service provided by the entire team. When a glass broke at one table, they responded swiftly, ensuring a clean table for the guests. Exceptional service all around! Kudos to the team !

I celebrated my birthday here with party package. The room was spacious, clean and comfy. We love the sound system. That microphone really made us sound so good. John and the team were very nice and accommodating, gave me discounts and free hour. Thanks for making this event a memorable one. We will surely comeback for more.

Huge K Bar with a good selection of whiskey and beer. Lots of rooms with finger food which can be ordered inside. The staff, John is very friendly and hospitable. Make sure you book before you come as it's always full on weekends and in the evenings.

If you love singing, Sing My song Kinex is a location that you should not miss. The rooms are equipped with great sound system and if you are enthusiastic or hardcore enough, come sing at the hall that is well equipped with fantastic sound system ( I kid you not) as well. You will definitely sound great! (In my opinion) Staff are friendly and a joy to interact with. Give it a try and I’m sure you won’t regret. If you are going to sing in the hall, please make a reservation beforehand. Table are usually booked especially on weekends or public holiday.

vicinity: 11 Tanjong Katong Road, #03-05 Kinex Shopping Mall
